subject: Taxes
description_text:
Good afternoon, Im looking into buying  the SIMSONN Plus X (2 pedals with baseplate) and saw that you have a Black Friday promotion, but Im from Portugal and wanted to know how much in total will I have to spend to get the pedals, item+shipping+taxes.

Is there a way to know how much the taxes are gonna be?

Best Regards
André Fanico

Enviado de Outlook para Android<https://aka.ms/AAb9ysg>

conversations.body_text: Hi Andre Fanico,    Please don't worry—we will ship your order from our German warehouse, and no customs duties or other fees will be incurred.
